snippet.title: Zorya NEW Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/zorya/zorya

Website: https://madlifegames.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/f5y5jDH
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zoryagame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZoryaGame

Zorya is a two-player cooperative puzzle game where one player navigates the world by staying in the shadows, whilst the other controls the sun and time of day to prevent his  friend from dying in the sunlight.

They must both help each other out by creating shadow paths, communicating to escape stubborn enemies and team up to solve the puzzles to complete each level.

The prototype won several awards during the Ubisoft GameLab Competition 2017 such as: Best Prototype, Best Creativity and Integration of the Theme and Public’s choice Award. We also had the chance to represent Canada at the E3 2017 exposition as the best game canadian game at college level, by winning the Entertainment Software Association of Canada (ESAC) competition.
